question.text:
Match the following :
i Riboflavin a Beriberi
ii Thiamine b Scurvy
iii Pyridoxine c Cheilosis
iv Ascorbic acid d Convulsions

solution.text:
Vitamin Deficiency Disease 
Vitamin  B 1 Beri Beri
Vitamin  B 2 Cheilosis 
Vitamin  B 6 convulsions
Vitamin  C Scurvy
